name: Connor
description: Paraplegic employee at brew ability no known developmental or intellectual disability.
aiEnhancedDetails: Connor is an adult male with a light complexion. His hair, visible beneath a backward-worn white mesh cap, appears light brown or dirty blonde and extends to approximately shoulder length. He has light facial hair, appearing as stubble or a short beard, visible along his jawline and chin. His nose is straight and of medium size, and his lips are of medium thickness. He exhibits a defined jawline. His upper body appears developed. A distinguishing physical characteristic is his paraplegia, which necessitates the use of a manual wheelchair for mobility.
